During a teleconference Monday, Simon Cowell suggested his former American Idol colleague Paula Abdul could be in the running for The X-Factor judging panel. "I'm a massive fan of Paula Abdul ," he said. We've been in regular contact. I'm not going to say today who we are going to confirm or not, because the truth is we haven't made up our minds up yet.... It comes down to who I think is interesting, and the commitment and the expertise each person offers. The panel for the show( which debuts next fall) won't be announced for several weeks.
